title: T206 Polar Bear Gandil/Chase Trophy/miscut, + one special $125
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: T206 Polar Bear Gandil/Chase Trophy/miscut, + one special $125
posts.post_content:
I have a low grade lot of 23 different T206 Polar Bear backs. The highlights are a Gandil, Chase/Trophy and a Rucker with a very small miscut. Pictured Happy Smith because it is one of the nicer ones. Asking $345 for the lot, which is a good price that reflects the low grade nature of the other 19 cards(figure $10-12 each, but 4-5 are worth more)

  All the others are listed below:

  Abbott, Armbruster, Jack Barry, Batch, Carrigan, Casey, Clymer, Cravath, L.Doyle/batting, Harry Davis, Leifield/batting, LaPorte, Overall/hand face, Scott, Slagle, Street/catching, Doc White, Wright, Wiltsie/port cap
Bumped. Good price on these I think and a nice sized lot of PB backs

Scans added for those that asked, so you get a general idea. Chase and Barry(pictured below) are the only backs with more than a small spot of paper loss(similar to miscut back up top or heavy crease below)

I have these cards left:



$20: Wright

$30: Rucker(very slight miscut back), Chase/trophy

$60: Gandil (on hold)
Wright, which is the nicest of the group, Rucker/slight miscut and Chase trophy still available.   $75 takes them all or individual prices above.

Gandil is available again, so special on these four left and I can mail them out today if it sells before noon:

   Wright in decent shape, Rucker/miscut, Chase/trophy and Gandil for $125 dlvd

  Otherwise I'll have all 104 cards that I have left individually priced tomorrow night, after someone I promised looks at the list first
Would you take $45 for the gandil ? Thanks
